item.title: Projects
item.description: I 💜 building cool stuff 👨‍💻 💻 Here are some of my side projects, class projects and others. Improving Retrieval in Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems Report discussing work done as part of the UMass’s CIIR team in the AlexaPrize Taskbot competition (Maruna Bot). The goal of the competition was to build a multi-modal agent that would assist customers in completing tasks requiring multiple steps and decisions. Worked on implementing several retrieval techniques such as asking clarifying questions, facet extraction and re-ranking to retrieve results given user query.

item.title: Hi 👋
item.description: I’m Arkin Dharawat. I graduated from UIUC with a degree in Math and Computer Science in 12/19 and from UMass Amherst with a Master’s degree in 05/22. My interests include (but are not limited too!) Natural Language Processing, Big Data and Machine Learning Infrastructure. You can view my resume here Love to read about AI? You can checkout my Medium blog where I ramble about Bots, Machine learning and other technologies(like Blockchain)
